SELECT a.CODE FROM sys_module a, sys_role_module_ref b, sys_user_role_ref c
a.id = b.module_id AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND a.type IN ( 2, 3, 4 ) AND c.user_id =#{userId}

SELECT c.id,c.icon,c.name,c.url,c.parent_Id FROM sys_user_role_ref a, sys_role_module_ref b, sys_module c WHERE a.role_Id = b.role_Id AND b.module_id = c.id AND c.parent_id != -1 AND a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.type=1 ORDER BY c.id
